modName: Mageapprentice Robe Necromancer Retex by standalone09
summary: My *NOT YET FINISHED* Retex of the vanilla mageapprentice Robe.
descriptionHtml:
So this is my *BEING UPDATED...* Retex of the default Mageapprentice Robe. 

A must have for everybody who likes the default Mageapprentice Robe more then the ugly vanilla Necromancer Robe that you can obtain too at the beginning of the game. 
Currently its only available for your Female Characters but like mentioned above i will continue updating this so feel free to post what you like or not what i could add or remove etc. 

and of course HAVE FUN WITH IT! :D
author: standalone09
